t: Amazon.com: Amazon Basics Beginner Violin Bundle, Full Size, Solid wood,Natural - Bow, Strings, Strap, Tuner, Rosin, and Case : Musical Instruments
s: If I could give a rating of zero I most definitely would. Don't waste your money or time on this violin. The bridge was not fitted and needs to be fixed, and the tuner pegs will not turn meaning it can't be tuned trust me look at a different brand to save yourself from the heartache.
